ggchull example
========================================================
```{r fig.width=10, fig.height=10}
source("ggchull.R")

require(ggplot2)

test_df <- data.frame(
      x=c(rnorm(50,1),rnorm(50,10)),
      y=c(rnorm(50,1),rnorm(50,10)),
      grouping=c(rep("A",50),rep("B",50))
      )

qplot(x,y,data=test_df) + ggchull(test_df,"x","y","grouping")

```
